column1: Aron Lausch;Ar0n01;ChEMBL;https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/chembl/ChEMBLdb/releases/chembl_34/;ChEMBL is a large bioactivity database
column2: which contains information on drugs and their targets
column3: published as RDF. It supports drug discovery by linking biological activities
column6: making it an ideal resource for life sciences research.
